{{sName}}

Articles are fetched from their website using {{sHomepageSelector}} and {{sHomepageLinkExtractor}}. Moreover, highlight articles are gathered through rankings on their website and extracted using {{sHighlightSelector}} and {{sHighlightLinkExtractor}}.

This media outlet is deactivated.

Details

Create media outlet

It is not possible to completely delete media outlets. This is because all data somehow is related to a media outlets. Deleting one such outlet could thus affect many other data points. If you really need to get rid of it, deactivate it.
